results.title: Frank Field, Who Brought Expertise to TV Weathercasting, Dies at 100
results.abstract: The first meteorologist to forecast the weather on New York television, he later became known for, among other things, publicizing the Heimlich maneuver.

media.caption: Frank Field delivering the weather forecast on WNBC-TV in New York in 1974. He was a presence on New York and network television for more than 40 years.
media.copyright: NBCUniversal Photo Bank, via Getty Images

results.title: Religious Freedom Arguments Underpin Wave of Challenges to Abortion Bans
results.abstract: In lawsuits challenging state abortion bans, lawyers for abortion rights plaintiffs are employing religious liberty arguments the Christian right has used for decades.

media.caption: Mikayla drove from Texas to a hotel in Albuquerque to use the first telemedicine abortion service operated by a religion, one of many recent efforts to use religious freedom arguments to uphold abortion rights.
media.copyright: Adria Malcolm for The New York Times

results.title: As Cases Soar, ‘Dementia Villages’ Look Like the Future of Home Care
results.abstract: A new generation of treatment facilities is aiming to integrate dementia patients with the communities around them, blurring lines between home and hospital.

media.caption: The Hogeweyk dementia village in Weesp, Netherlands, opened in 2009 as a new model for treating people with dementia. The facility resembles a quaint Dutch village, with a town square, restaurant and other amenities.

results.abstract: A visitor to the North Carolina amusement park recorded a crack in a pillar of the ride, Fury 325, which is billed as one of the tallest of its kind.

media.caption:
**OKAY FOR NEWS SERVICE**

What appears to be a crack is seen on a supporting pillar of the Fury 325 coaster at Carowinds Amusement Park in Charlotte, N.C.

results.title: Hunter Biden’s Daughter and a Tale of Two Families
results.abstract: The story surrounding the president’s grandchild in Arkansas, who has not yet met her father or her grandfather, is about money, corrosive politics and what it means to have the Biden birthright.

media.caption: Lunden Roberts posted photos of her daughter during a trip to Washington on Instagram. DNA testing established that the girl’s father is Hunter Biden, but she has yet to meet him or President Biden.
